content.html: Tory bullshit in action… £400 for all households + £650 for poorest = £1,050 Now, who remembers the Universal Credit cut of £20 per week? £20 x 52 weeks = £1,040 Are you seeing it people?! That’s £10 you’re up during a cost of living crisis Don’t spend it all at once!
content.value:
Tory bullshit in action…

£400 for all households + £650 for poorest = £1,050

Now, who remembers the Universal Credit cut of £20 per week?

£20 x 52 weeks = £1,040

Are you seeing it people?!

That’s £10 you’re up during a cost of living crisis

Don’t spend it all at once!
